code: import{PROFILE_ERROR,PROFILE_SUCCESS,EDIT_PROFILE,RESET_PROFILE_FLAG}from"./actionTypes";export var editProfile=function editProfile(user){return{type:EDIT_PROFILE,payload:{user:user}};};export var profileSuccess=function profileSuccess(msg){return{type:PROFILE_SUCCESS,payload:msg};};export var profileError=function profileError(error){return{type:PROFILE_ERROR,payload:error};};export var resetProfileFlag=function resetProfileFlag(error){return{type:RESET_PROFILE_FLAG};};
